import {Constants} from "../../common/constants";
 
class GlobalKeys implements ng.IDirective {
    public static $inject = ["xuiConstants"];
 
    constructor(private constants:Constants) {
    }
 
    public restrict = "A";
 
    public link = ($scope:ng.IScope, element:ng.IAugmentedJQuery, attrs:ng.IAttributes) => {
        element.keydown((e:JQueryEventObject) => {
            if (e.ctrlKey && e.keyCode === this.constants.KEY_CODE.TILDE) { // 'ctrl~'
                element.toggleClass("xui-reveal");
            }
        });
    };
}
 
export default GlobalKeys;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Fri Dec 15 2017 19:51:34 GMT+0000 (UTC)
